Articles.Content:
Just started on KSP a few days ago...woulda joined the forums earlier but they went down the same time I started (hope thats not a bad sign...) Anyhow, been loving the game lots of fun, steep initial learning curve but its starting to click. Made my first successful trip to Mun and back...Planning out an actual landing there now.

Anyhow, lookin forward to learning more

A-ha! So it was you!

Just kidding, welcome
